branchCategory.name: CA2-Z, Double Acting Single Rod, Temperature Resistant Option
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CA2 with high temperature resistant options are double acting, single rod version of the standard CA2 rod air cylinder.  The CA2 is available in 40, 50, 63, 80 and 100 bore sizes and is RoHS compliant.</p>
